translations.MiniOS Flux transforms any computer into: MiniOS Flux transforms any computer into your personal workstation in seconds.
translations.Boot into your familiar environment from: Boot into your familiar environment from a USB drive. No installation required,
translations.no traces left behind. Works flawlessly: no traces left behind. Works flawlessly on vintage and modern hardware.
translations.Your complete digital workspace on a USB: Your complete digital workspace on a USB drive. Boot it on any computer, and your customizations and data load exactly as you left them.
translations.Released separately on Debian 10, 11, an: Released separately on Debian 10, 11, and 12. Optimized for legacy hardware with the ultra-lightweight Fluxbox interface.
Performance without sacrificing beauty. A meticulously crafted design that works incredibly fast on modest computers.
translations.Download via torrent as part of the comp: Download via torrent as part of the complete MiniOS 5.1 collection
translations.* You can run the system with even less: * You can run the system with even less RAM than specified. Flux is optimized for minimal resource consumption.
translations.Lightweight, modular, and fast Linux dis: Lightweight, modular, and fast Linux distribution based on Debian.
translations.The download should start automatically: The download should start automatically in a few seconds.
translations.MiniOS is completely free and open-sourc: MiniOS is completely free and open-source. Developing and maintaining this project requires significant time and resources. Your support means everything to us!
